deleteUserData.paragraphPrefix: To delete your data, please submit a request to
deleteUserData.paragraphSuffix: We will delete all data related to you within 24 hours.

privacy.paragraphPrefix: To obtain privacy policies, please submit a request to
privacy.paragraphSuffix: We will send all privacy policies to you within 24 hours.

versionConflict.paragraph: Inventory data has been modified by another user. You can:

listItems.textUpdate: download the latest version of data from the server
listItems.textRewrite: save your changes over the current ones
